name: Photon Explosion
description:
PHOTON EXPLOSION!

A casual endless game made in 2 days for Global Game Jam 2018, the goal is to take over as much planets/suns/comets as you can while trying not to get eliminated by enemies. 

CONTROLS: Use MOUSE to drag and select planets

DEVELOPER: Peter Lu

The planets are not randomly generated right now, but they will soon be, because I didn't have enough time to complete and include this feature in the game.

There will be more updates of this game including power ups, planets, better AIs and many more, so stay alert!

If you have any problems installing the game or you have other questions/feebacks please comment below and let me know, I'll try my best to help you!
